item.title: Ubuntu Python virtual environments pitfalls
item.description:
I always face several pitfalls, while creating isolated python environment on my laptop, where i’m running Ubuntu.

So decided to make a memory note how to fight them, probably it can be helpful to anyone else.

item.title: Ubuntu PIL JPEG support
item.description:
Got an IOError exception, while trying to process image using PIL, with a next error message:

encoder jpeg not available

PIL is installed within python virtual environment. Figured out, I have no development files for libjpeg installed, so PIL compiles without JPEG support.
